name: Extermungus
description:
WIP Submission Build

Exterminate the albino sewer alligators of legend and get back home in time to save your Halloween candy!

If you dig this, I'll make more. Made as a meme project inspired by EXTERMINARY by RETRODEAD

Controls:

  • Q - Switch Weapons
  • Left Click - Fire
  • Right Click - Melee
  • Space - Jump
  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • ESC - Pause Menu (AUDIO SETTINGS HERE)

Coming Soon!?:

  • Items (including a pumpkin)
  • Status Effects
  • XP, Levels, and stats
  • A boss!
  • Controller Support!? (Dualsense...whaaa?)
  • Multiplayer!? (who knows?)

Credits

Music: 80s Motivational Chiptune by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
